description: Application for removal of existing shopfront and reconstruction of previous shopfront; and retention of extraction vent to rear in association with use of ground floor unit as restaurant under Use Class E (part retrospective).
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-88317e26-7fff-f8eb-68bc-ff1b1c5e07b6"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The use hereby permitted shall not commence until details of an ongoing maintenance plan for the fume extraction and filtration equipment (as recommended by manufacturers/suppliers) have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The approved equipment shall thereafter be retained and maintained in working order for the duration of the use in accordance with the approved details. Maintenance records shall be retained and made available upon request by an Environmental Protection Officer.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">:</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the surrounding area.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0ecc30fc-7fff-3e9d-9fba-37e8cbbd3036"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><ul></ul><p></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-0ecc30fc-7fff-3e9d-9fba-37e8cbbd3036"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Any new plant and associated equipment shall be installed to prevent noise/vibration transmission to neighbouring premises. The rated noise level shall not exceed background noise level (10dB below) when measured 1m external to the nearest sensitive premises.</span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">An acoustic assessment must be carried out by an IOA-accredited consultant in accordance with BS 4142:2014+A1:2019. Necessary mitigation measures shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The plant shall thereafter be installed and maintained per the approved details.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason:</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> To maintain acceptable local noise levels.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2fc8b28e-7fff-7c43-f85b-2adfc64d5f6f"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">ï»¿</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Sound insulation shall be installed between the ground floor commercial premises and the first-floor residential premises. A scheme of sound insulation shall be submitted to the Councilâs Noise Section for approval prior to use of the extract system.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">:</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> To ensure required sound insulation and prevent noise nuisance.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3d07a20c-7fff-5932-4d0f-9d3c9a3baa70"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">A sound insulation test shall be carried out to confirm that adequate insulation has been provided to limit noise transfer to the dwelling above. Test results shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3d07a20c-7fff-5932-4d0f-9d3c9a3baa70"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Reason:</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> To ensure adequate sound insulation and prevent noise nuisance.</span></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-08c2bb50-7fff-5534-88db-6f725611fafe"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><ul></ul><p></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">A copy of a signed contract with Purified Air (or similar) for cleaning and maintenance shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and shall include the following:</span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><ul></ul><p></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">i. Confirmation that extractor hood canopy and baffle filters will be cleaned at least weekly.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">ii. </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Confirmation that the e</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">xtractor system and ductwork cleaning will be scheduled every three months.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">iii. </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Confirmation that f</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space-collapse: preserve;">ilters to be replaced as recommended by the supplier/manufacturer.</span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;"></p><ul></ul><p></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">An extract system maintenance contract must state that the system will be maintained as recommended by the supplier/manufacturer, with maintenance records retained for inspection.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.38; text-align: justify; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure appropriate maintenance of the system.</span></p>
